summary: Rennie Cray (Caviezel) embarks on a bloodthirsty rampage to avenge the death of his wife who was struck down by a serial killer - a man who hunts and kills women using his '72 El Dorado.
cast: Jim Caviezel|Rhona Mitra|Frankie Faison|Colm Feore|Gordon Currie|Andrea Roth|Noam Jenkins|Toby Proctor|James Kee|Guylaine St-Onge|Joe Pingue|Martin Roach|Ron Bell|Paul Rutledge|Kelly Jones|Bryan Renfro|Ralph Chapman|Jason McCormack|Paul Mota|Michael Stevens
title: Sin aliento
